ModMetadata.Name: Beef's Shader Changes
ModMetadata.Author: TheRealBeef
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Beef's Shader Changes[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a BepInEx Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
There is an in-game config menu with F10.
Post-processing and visual effects mod adding adjustments for in-game SSAO and Bloom and adding new effects.
[h2]Features:[/h2] - [b]SSAO (Ambient Occlusion)[/b] > Enables SSAO that's currently disabled in Stationeers > 3 quality presets (Low/Medium/High) plus fully customizable settings > Custom noise pattern
- [b]Bloom[/b] > Adjustable intensity and threshold controls
- [b]Helmet Visor Reflections[/b] > When enabled, automatically activates when wearing closed helmets and deactivates when open or removing helmet > Adjustable reflection quality and intensity
- [b]Depth of Field[/b] > Not really great for gameplay for most, but great for screenshots > Adjustable focal distance, focal size, and aperture
Configuration available through F10 in-game menu or BepInEx config files.
Source Code: https://github.com/TheRealBeef/Beefs-Stationeers-Shader-Changes
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: 2.0.0: - Complete rewrite of the original shader fixes mod - Updated SSAO/bloom fixes from the original - Added helmet visor effects - Added depth of field effect - Added in-game configuration menu (F10)
